item.title: Email
item.description: To avoid bots scraping around and sending me even more spam that I already receive, I won’t explicitly write my email. You can see it below:

item.title: If I ever write something, it will be here
About
item.description: tl;dr Software developer. Infrastructure engineer. I like python, infrastructure as code, automation, linux sysadmin and weird old technology Current Employer Working for Itility, currently allocated at ASML. Past Employers ThoughtWorks Hogarth Worldwide Sindus ANDRITZ Lakes Environmental Dell SAP Valid Skills Python C# Java Shell scripting Javascript Ansible Terraform Cloudformation AWS GCP Some CICDs (GoCD, CircleCI, Buildkite, Bamboo, they’re mostly the same) There are more in my LinkedIn profile.
